name: J L
text: Dr Collier is the best.  Topnotch, staff, office and care.  He is a wonderful man, very compassionate, great care and his work is painless.  Don't waste your time going elsewhere, Dr Collier is the only person for a root canal.  He's #1.

name: Mo B
text: I was referred to Brookwood Endodontists for a root canal that hurt so bad my ear felt the pain! 😀 They got me in that day and did the root canal. Dr. Collier was the one who drew the short straw to get me as a patient cuz I'm the biggest pansy when it comes to dental work and he did AWESOME work.  They made sure I was as comfortable as possible and took xrays during the procedure which is a good sign of thoroughness. All the staff were friendly and professional. For someone who doesn't like dentists (nothing personal) I wish I could hear more from this staff personally. Being a Christian, this office reminded me of the body of Christ and I wish I had more! Great example y'all!

name: Kim Jerkins
text: Had a root canal performed and the staff was extremely nice.  Before the procedure the doctor explained everything and made sure I understood. While the root canal was being done Dr. Collier and his assistant asked me several times if I was doing okay or needed anything.  I was already pretty nervous so this definitely made the visit more pleasant.  After they were done I was given my Rx and instructions for what I needed to do.  The next day the office called to check on me and ask if I had any questions.  If I ever need anything else done I will definitely go back.

name: Cierra Cherry
text: Dr. Collier and his staff are absolutely amazing. I would recommend anyone getting a root canal to come see him.

name: Danny McCullars
text: Really? You are a root canal dentist that goes on TV and promotes Gary Palmer crying to repeal the Affordable Care Act, which of course includes repeal of protection of discrimination against preexisting conditions. The oath doesn’t apply to dentists? Face on TV? Palmer line your pocket? Smells disgusting.

name: Laura Gail Claassen
text: At 8 months pregnant and wearing Invisilign braces, I was experiencing tooth sensitivity and discoloration on one tooth. In a panic, I called Dr. John Collier and they fit me in at lunchtime. Not only that, but the office manager babysat my 4 year old and kept him entertained while Dr. Collier examined me. He determined that I needed a route canal and said that I could stay there and get it done and they would continue to look after my little boy so I wouldn't have to come back. Only a few hours later and the discoloration is already gone. Dr. Collier and his staff prayed over me and handled me with such sensitivity and compassion that I cannot imagine getting endodontics service done anywhere else. Also, they have a beautiful waiting room to boot. Do not go to anyone else but Dr. Collier - you won't be dissappointed!!!!!

name: Clifton Payne
text: Absolutely great Dentist

name: L S
text: Dr. Kamburis and his staff will make you feel comfortable and put your mind at ease as soon as you walk in the door! I was very nervous for my root canal but I didn't need to be since he explained everything, and it was painless and I felt so much better after. I will definitely recommend Dr. Kamburis and his staff to everyone!

name: Alese Morgan
text: Dr. Kamburis and his team are top notch! Dr. Kamburis made sure I had little to no discomfort  and communicated with me throughout the procedure. Dr. Kamburis and staff are hyper vigilant on infection control protocols during pandemic and I felt comfortable my entire visit. Follow up  phones calls made me feel well taken care for my  post procedure needs. The entire staff is top notch and you can tell they pride themselves on delivering quality care. Thank you for all your care. I will recommend you to all my friends and family.

name: Bobbie Weldon Canada
text:
Wonderful experience when having a root canal!
Dr. Kamburis Is very compassionate and gentle.
He  continued to check on how I was doing from the beginning of the procedure and until he was finished. His assistant, Ashley, was also  gentle. They were clear about everything that was happening, so there were no surprises. And I hate pain, but no worries there. Dr. Kamburis gradually gave me a type of numbing so that I hardly knew anything was happening. I couldn’t be more thrilled to find
Dr. Kamburis and his sweet staff! The receptionist was amazing, too!! Thank you all so much!

name: Mary Grace Tackage
text:
Dr James Kamburis and staff were all very friendly and very nice! Felt very comfortable with them all!
Also very professional!

name: William Barnes
text: Excellent doctor.  Dr Kamburis was very thorough and knowledgeable.  He and his staff were very courteous.  They followed up with me to make sure I was doing well.  I highly recommend his services.

name: Katie Nelson
text: Really good visit.  The staff was super nice and the doctor was really patient with me.  Definitely if I ever needed another root canal I would return .

name: Amanda Cook
text: They were so kind and able to see me quickly. I will definitely use them again.

name: Randy Johnson
text: I’m glad I went to dr Kamburis for my root canal because he was patient with me being nervous. And he answered all my questions. Everyone else in the office was kind and helpful. I will go back to his office if I need another root canal.

name: Tamara Winston
text: Great staff and service.  The assistant (Ashley) and Dr. Kamburis were very thorough with explaining the root canal process.

name: jackie scott
text: I have had no problems and it was super easy. Thanks a bunch

name: Stephanie Park
text: I really liked the mouth dam. Made me feel more comfortable. Constant checking on me made me feel good too. I like to know that I am cared for and comfortable. Thank you !

name: Andrea Brown
text: Dr. Kamburis and his staff was very professional and caring.  I impressed with the services.

name: Lori Smart
text: I cannot say enough about the positive experience I had at Dr. Kamburis’s office.  First of all, because I was in such pain, his receptionist kindly fit me in on a busy Monday morning.  Having had two root canals before, at different offices, I wasn’t looking forward to another.  Yet my experience was so amazing.  Every step of the way, both the assistant and Dr. Kamburis explained exactly what was being done.  The gentleness of Dr. Kamburis calmed my fears.  He asked several times if I was feeling any pain – and he went overboard to assure me that he’d give me more Novocain if I were experiencing the slightest pain.  He was gentle in administering it as well in the whole root canal process.  I could tell he was knowledgeable and experienced in this procedure; yet he explained it all to me in terms that I could understand.  My husband, who is also in the dental field, joked that he had never known someone who got so excited as me about a root canal! I have already recommended Dr. Kamburis to several people and am truly grateful to this wonderfully competent and kind doctor and his amazing staff.

name: Sallie Hines
text: By far the best experience that I have ever experienced. Today, I had a root canal done. At hello the staff was completely amazing and willing to take my anxiety to an ease. Dr. Kamburis helped me through my needle phoebea, and I must admit I barely felt a thing!!! Amazing! Amazing!! Thank you for taking care of me and allowing me to find trust into you guys

name: Todd Taylor
text: I wouldn't get a root canal from anyone else in this town, and you shouldn't either! Dr. Kamburis is totally professional and personable, just a great guy. I've had 2 root canals from him, and it just couldn't have gone any smoother. Oh, and pain free! The support staff is super accommodating and courteous, also. 5 stars across the board!

name: Marc Berg
text: You guys did a great job! Attentive care by doctor and staff. Much appreciated. 10 out of 10. Would recommend!

name: Tommy Jenkins
text: The BEST dental experience I've ever had. The doctor was informative and made sure I was comfortable through out the root canal. Thanks for being so kind and professional.

name: Brian Harrison
text: Fantastic office and staff.Timely with my appointment and Dr. Kamburis was very skilled and made sure to take the time to explain his thoughts, diagnosis, recommendations, and the procedure. I live in Atlanta, while in Montgomery. I needed help. I came in with a broken tooth. Dr. Kamburis was able to fix me up in 1.5 hours in a single day(no required follow up visit). Painless, convenient, and competitively priced. He is a great asset to the city of Montgomery. He and his staff kept me at ease the whole time I was there. I will return again. I wish Dr. Kamburis was in Atlanta.

name: Stuart Patton
text:
Very well done!
Totally painless. Thank you!

name: Beautiful
text: I was charged me almost 1,000.00 for a re treatment of a root canal. They asked me to pay even first like I would try to get free services or something which was  insulting.1,000.00 is a  big price tag  and they gave me a temporary fill in for my tooth. I still have to spend more money and get a permanent fill in. My procedure was fast. Also, I can't close my left eye all the way from the numbing medication. Other than that my procedure was fast and they were very caring.

name: Arich Ryan Reynolds
text: Friendly staff! Put me at ease! Procedure was much faster and without near as much pain (and I’ve had multiple root canals with at different places before). Very impressed!

name: Raul P
text: Went  to Dr Kamburis for root canal therapy. He and his staff were great.  The whole procedure took about 45 minutes and it was painless.  It was a wonderful experience.

name: Altrenna Thomas
text: I am very impressed with Dr. Kamburris.  His staff is very nice and knowledgeable about teeth.  His office is very clean.  He is very knowledgeable about root canals.  I am so happy that he did my root canal and not some other doctor.

name: Alan Johnston
text: I got an appointment very quick and the root canal was easy. Dr. Kamburis and the young lady assistant checked on me to make sure I was ok. The whole office really cares. I would recommend anyone that needs a root canal.

name: kim johnson
text: Just wanted to thank everyone for being so nice and having a good experience. I've had no more problems!!

name: Kelly Lafreniere
text: Everyone was very gentle and professional. It was not painful and I would recommend the office to friends. It was a great experience.

name: SaLena Embry
text: The office staff, the assistants, and Dr. Kamburis himself, made the root canal process as pleasant and painless as it could have been.  He was so gentle with me and so conscientious of my comfort. He checked in with me every few moments to make sure I wasn't in any pain. His assistant was wonderful; she explained the equipment she would be using and was very kind.  I had no pain, only slight discomfort from the numbing which passed quickly. And i have no had a single issue since: I followed the post treatment directions and I haven't had any pain, swelling, or discomfort of any kind. I plan on thanking my dentist wholeheartedly for referring me to this office.

name: Ariel Underwood
text: Great staff and doctor. They are all so kind and I appreciate the services provided. I will recommend you all to others. Thank you!

name: Johnny Chaney
text: I was overcharged 9x the amount I actually owed them,and after I informed them about their supposedly error,they did not seem to be in any hurry to give me my money. As of this review my insurance has paid them and  they have not reimbursed me. I felt butchered during the root canal and I never even saw the doctor’s face,he came into the room sitting in a chair with a mask on and started working on me. Looking back,I don’t think he wanted to treat me. While I was still sitting in the chair after the procedure,they gave me a survey to fill out which I declined. I will not go back to him.

name: Kimberly
text: Love Dr. Kamburis and his wonderful staff. Took care of my needs right away. Very professional and just delightful to work with! Would highly recommend to anyone.

name: Jay Arr
text: Did an amazing job on my root canal! Made me feel comfortable the whole way through . Professional attitude

name: Keith Dykes
text: Super friendly staff .They will help you on anything. Couldn't make it another day without them . Extremely helpful .I will recommend anyone to this office.

name: Tommy Dorch
text: Was very comfortable considering the situation I'm in. Thanks.

name: RandomMom _
text: Great experience. I had been dreading the procedure, but was pleasantly surprised there was no reason to be!

name: Rosetta BrownHuffman
text: Everyone was very nice and explained everything that they did throughout the procedure. It was simply painless.

name: sam smith
text: Dr. Kamburis and his staff are outstanding.  Everything was very smooth, from my appointment, the actual procedure and the follow up. I would highly recommend Montgomery Endodontics.

name: Sara Brown
text: Dr. Kamburis and his staff are just wonderful people. Very friendly environment. I would recommend Dr. Kamburis to anybody. Such a great place.

name: Angie Ciesla

name: Ebony Dusk

name: Johnny Strickland

name: christa spann

name: Steve O
text: Very professional, thoughtful and courtesy staff..from the receptionist, the dental assistant to the Dr. himself! Made sure I was comfortable and at ease before beginning and throughout the procedure.

name: Briana Jackson

name: Amber Leeper
text: Very Sweet Staff and Doctor.Always making sure you are comfortable and not feeling any pain.I will definitely recommend Dr. James Kamburis to my friends and family.

I will never return to his office and wouldn't refer anyone else.

name: Fannie Pettway

name: Charles Boyd
text: Great service and staff thanks to you all very much.

name: Janet Mathews
text: Thank you so much for good service. 😃

name: Roger Dyess
text: Excellent staff, prompt appointments, Dr.Kamburis is Supierior with expert skills and knowledge.Goos down to earth communication skills. Cares about his patients.

name: Mimi Meria
text: The staff is very professional and caring!!

name: Carlton James
text: Very rude receptionist that refuse to even give a basic time line of ehnr they could see me for a procedure without first making me come in so they can do an evaluation.  Even with evaluation complete at other facility they want to do another one.

name: Don Daniels
text:
Dr. Kamburris was very attentive to my every need. I felt at home from when I opened the door until I left. The receptionist, nurses and Dr. Kamburris were just like family. I could not have asked for a more friendly and professional group to get to know and have an established kinship. All of us had conversations and it didn't add to my time of waiting. I even received a courtesy call on the way to make sure I good directions to their office because it could have been a little hard to find. I thought now that is service and the beginning of a wonderful morning.
Thanks to Dr. Kamburris and your staff.

name: Robbin Simmons
text: Worst experience of my life!  When giving me the numbing shot, he hit a nerve that sent an electric shock through my lip.  During the procedure he was so rough he was banging on my upper teeth with the drill.  I had several panic attacks during the procedure.  Then after the procedure I was so numb I could not swallow which caused me to choke.  I was in the doctor's restroom for over 5 minutes choking and NO ONE came to check on me.  WORST experience of my life!

name: Yvette SEARIGHT
text: Very professional, caring staff, and informative.

name: BYRDIE Yeah
text: They don't like to give you a straight up price over the phone because they know they plan to charge you a price that's up in the thousands...if they were to tell u up front before you came then they know that you wont bother to show up.

name: Johnny Morris
text: Truly enjoyed my visit and treatment.....

name: Melissa McCay
text: Dr. Cooner and staff go beyond standard care to make sure you have the best smile possible. The staff is always friendly. I've had absolutely amazing service at every visit.

name: september Parker
text: I highly recommend this office. They are the best!! They care so much about there patients everyone is like family. Dr. Ray and Dr.Logan take there time in explaining everything in detail. And the Staff is amazing the best staff you could ever have. But most of all the Botox and Filler this office does no one around can compare they are truly artist!!! They believe in making you happy that is there overall goal and making you feel the best you can feel about you and your smile. I love you guys

name: Tsunami Shijo
text: Pulled my broken tooth. Rear molar. Seen me the day I called. Got me in, numbed me up, took about 3-5 minutes max to get it out. Paid my bill and went on my way.

name: Jerome Hastings
text: Absolutely wonderful staff

name: Cara Turner
text: Dr Tedder is such a good soul. I recommend her to anyone. She has been such a wonderful doctor. My Son adores her and loves going to see her . She has the sweetest staff as well.

name: Thomas Alford
text: Been using Dr. Tedder for years, very pleased with her .

name: Robert May
text: The folks there are very nice and professional. Everything is super clean, and they take every precaution to be sure patients stay healthy, especially considering COVID-19.

name: G Floyd
text: We’ve been coming here for 9 or 10 years now. I love the service and the atmosphere. Everyone welcomes you with a warm smile and greeting. Dr. Teddar, listens to your concerns and will give you a thorough examination. Satsuma Family Dental is definitely the best.

name: Aemanda Landry
text: First I would like to say it's awesome Google notified me this is a women led office. All the staff are females and that always eases me more. Second the issue was with my son. He was 6 and had not one cavity up until now. The whole staff are wonderful and really helped him relax the multiple times we had to come and then finally to have his tooth pulled. They walked him through the whole process and eazed all the anxiety my little one had. If I could give the staff more than 5 stars I would. They worked very fast and effective. The staff maintains a very clean environment and a very welcoming environment. I really applaud these ladies for the standard they have set during this epidemic and helping my family feel better about a scary procedure.

name: Alex Peterson
text: Never thought i would look forward to going to the dentist office. This is the best i have encountered in 30 years.

name: Murray Murphy
text: Highly recommend!   Friendly, very professional and efficient Staff .

name: Sandy Smith
text:
Dr Tedder’s office is the best I have found for children’s dentistry. I started going to her in 2003 with my first granddaughter. I am now going to her with my second grandson although I’m 35 miles away.

Although COVID-19 has changed some things, the care starting at the reception area and continuing through checkout can’t be beat. They are so intuned to a child’s needs it instantly puts them at ease. Prior to COVID they would have several assistants working with your child. They talk to them massage their arms and legs while getting cleanings and fillings. Just beautiful 🥰

They make it a great experience for you and your child or grandchild. They leave happy and unafraid of coming back.

name: Rocquell Besteda
text: The best dentist office I've ever been to! The staff is awesome alone with Mrs Tedder! They make u feel like your at home lol!! I've been with them over 3yrs and they haven't changed a bit!!

name: Van Stewart
text: Simply awesome dentist.  Dr. Tedder and all of her staff are friendly and professional.  I highly recommend them.

name: Tiffany Harrison
text: These ladies from the front desk to the back including Dr. Tedder were AMAZING!!!! Both my boys had a really bad experience with another dentist, and didnt want to go back. I called around to several dentist office to try making an appointment for both my boys and Dr. Tedder was the only one that i could get into see. And I am so glad she was. My boys were happy with their visit too. I wanted to find a dentist closer to home anyway, so it all worked out!  I am so happy I took them to see Dr. Tedder and her amazing staff!! Thank you all for this great experience!!!!

name: Darlene Houk
text: Everyone here is very polite, when I was trying to find out their information they were patient and very much informative on all the information they gave me.

name: Bobby Wheeler
text: From the front desk to the exam room, very professional doctor and staff. Have had two root canals done by Dr. Roth. He is gentle yet thorough with his work. Highly recommend.

name: radarice2
text: I have had three root canal procedures with Dr Roth. The last one in January 2020. In all three, I found Dr Roth and his staff to be the most caring and efficient practitioners of a complex profession. Years ago, a dental surgeon friend once told me that if ever I needed a root canal done, find a dentist that is really good and has done a lot of these procedures. Dr Roth qualifies in each case. I also partook of his Nitrous Oxide (laughing gas) machine which made the procedure much more comfortable. I highly recommend Dr Roth.

name: Charles Lewis
text: I love Dr. Todd.. Words don’t do justice!

name: Mike Waites
text: I was a patient here today. Probably the best experience in a long while. If your like me I alway get tense at and dentist etc. don’t worry. The staff here was awesome! They put me at easy, no waiting, and Doctor Todd Roth took his time and explained the procedure in depth. He is a true professional. I know where to go in the future!

name: Coach Washington
text: It was great! That was my response when Dr. Roth asked how the root canal went. The staff, Carmen, Shiloh and Kristen were very warm and helpful. Dr. Roth was professional, experienced and caring. I had no pain during the procedure and I didn't have any days afterwards. I definitely recommend Dr. Roth for anyone needing a root canal!

name: A F
text:
I only went for an evaluation. Dr Roth was friendly and honest. The receptionist got so upset that I didn’t have my insurance information and started giving me an attitude. She really was a jerk. I paid the evaluation fee and never argued, but she just completely turned it into a terrible visit.  I have paid out of pocket and higher prices for friendly services.  I will not go back to that office if my insurer pays 100%.
A good face to your business is huge!
He needs to hire better help.

name: Cheryl Phillips
text: I had best experience! I feel great just hours after my root canal. I have TMJ and the procedure was done in a manner that was painless and time efficient. I would definitely recommend them to anyone.

name: Tymira McCall Bell
text: If I could have given him a negative zero I would have. Carmen is awesome. His assistant that came in was just as rude as he was. I would never recommend anyone to him. I was sent to him by my orthodontist and there is no way I would ever go back to him or allow him to do any work for me. You never know what people are going through Todd try to brighten others day Instead of being rude and disrespectful to your patients.

name: Brooke T
text: Dr Hwang did a great job on my tooth but if you have any type of anxiety I would not recommend this office. I made sure that they offered nitrous before I made my appointment and marked that I wanted it on my paperwork. I then told them once seated that I wanted it. Dr Hwang told me that I didn’t need it and that he would be quick. One hour later he was done.

name: Bethoc Dunwitty
text: I can't say enough wonderful things about this practice!   I was seen quickly, the hygenists were very attentive and took their time to listen carefully and do a thorough evaluation.   I was here to do a root canal.  It's not the most pleasant procedure in general, but Dr. James was considerate during the shots administered and allowed me time to adjust to the discomfort.  I'm so happy to say that I was in and out quickly and am in NO PAIN today.  Thanks so much for a great experience and wonderful professionalism.

name: Drew Davis
text: Dr. Hannahan and his staff was a life saver to me.  I had developed a infected tooth and was having severe pain 24/7. They performed a root canal Monday and I don't think you could have asked for a better outcome. The procedure was painless and they kept me comfortable the entire time. Each day is getting better (soreness from infected tissue around tooth) and best of all... no pain! I highly recommend them!

name: Julia King
text: The staff and Dr. Hannahan were very kind and helpful.  Dr. Hannahan made sure that I was in no pain and very thoughtful the entire time of the root canal.  Would use again!

name: Hal Walker
text: The Dr and his staff were great.  First ever root canal and it was probably the easiest dental work received to date.  Dr took the time to explain everything and was very kind and professional.

name: Roberto Racheal Martinez
text: Very nice. It was quick with minimal pain. The doctor even called to check on me a few hours after I left. He honestly knows how to do his job and I hope he knows how much I appreciate him taking it easy on me! 😬

name: Adam Baker
text: Dr. Hannahan did an excellent job of saving my teeth! I have terrible anxiety when it comes to dental surgery and was quite frightened prior to getting two root canals today.  Once I arrived the staff and doctor did an excellent job of calming me down.  The procedure itself was painless.  I was thoroughly numbed (so I felt no pain AT ALL) and utilized the nitrous to ensure I remained calm.  The surgery went well - I was in and out in no time!  I highly recommend Dr. Hannahan should you need to see an endodontist.  He is highly skilled and very courteous!

name: Emily Jordan
text: Very professional and friendly staff.  I had a root canal that was as  close to painless as you can get . Dr. Hannahan kept making sure I was okay which put me at ease .

name: Carolyn Haynes
text: I went to Cumberland back in 2015 to get fillings and a root canal done. Long story short, I have paid three times to get the same filling re-done and now my crown has came out which will result in me paying more money at another dentist office. I agree with others, they seem very rushed at everything they do, but I can’t afford for them to keep messing up costing me money. Never again will I go back, good luck to those who do and kudos to those who have had a better experience.

name: Flenardo Taylor
text: If they would take pride in their customers like their Christmas decoration. People will love them.  I read the reviews and I have to agree. The front staff wasn't so friendly. Only came for an exam. The dentist was cool.

name: Stephen McGatha
text: Been going for over a year now. They seem to genuinely offer good dental services. Fairly good at keeping dental appointments.

name: April Jordan
text: The worst place I've ever been.. Went to get 3 fillings put in and I was in so much pain for several days. The dentist never said a word to me when I went to get the fillings not even hello... I do not recommend this place to anyone. When I went back due to so much pain I found out he put the filling in too deep and hit a nerve now I have to get the tooth pulled or a root canal... SMH.. The worst place

name: Melissa Simmons
text: I went in last Saturday to get 4 wisdom tooth removed when I got back in the room for them to proceed to do the procedure I feel it was a rush job and they was just ready to go home dr. Kelly had no bedside manners in my opinion she was just ready to clock out to me I feel as if she was trying to talk me out of it after I paid cash money with no insurance to get it done after about four to five days at home I noticed the back of my teeth had a funny taste with something coming out of them I put a napkin in my mouth to find that it was yellow stuff coming out of it I immediately called the office on a Saturday during business hours no one ever picked up the phone after I got off work I proceeded to call back that night in the answering service picked up and I told her that someone needed to get in contact with me because it was an emergency and what the situation was this was Sunday it is now 4:10 p.m. Monday and no one has still contacted me I went to the emergency room on Sunday night and they told me the antibiotic that I got with the procedure that I had I should not have that antibiotic they put me on more antibiotics of which I had to pay for my ER visit but long story short I wouldn't recommend taking a dog to this place with no one contact you about an emergency that is a red flag!!!!!

name: Robert Caldwell
text: Very friendly staff,. professional I will recommend to others.

name: S
text: Do not go to them, they only care for money and the whole staff is snooty. Have never been to such a rude, snobby, uncaring set of people.

name: Synthia Johnson
text: Horrible...Terrible Dr's Bedside mannerisms...Won't go bck here......................

name: Thomas Dorer
text: I have been a patient of Dr. Dillard’s for over 20 years. He takes time to explain what needs to be addressed. The staff are friendly and engaging. I love the office. Like all dentists  though he still asked questions with his hands in my mouth.

name: Rachel Swain
text: There is NO better dentist, nor dentist staff, that is better than Dr. Dillard and his staff!! Like most, I’ve never been one to ‘get excited’ about the dentist, but now I am LEGITIMATELY excited and looking forward to seeing the staff and Dr. Dillard. They are so down to earth and personable, and there is no other dentist I’ll EVER visit in the greater Birmingham area :-)

name: Vicki Boswell
text:
I’m a new patient to Dr. Dillard, but feel like I have been coming here a long time.  Dr. Dillard and his entire staff make you feel at home and always make sure you are “ok”.  They are all very kind and make the entire experience enjoyable.  They are a faith based practice and their light always shines bright.

I have been to a lot of dentists in my lifetime and they are at the top of my list !!!

I highly recommend them !

name: Wendal Burks
text: I enjoy talking with Mrs Ryan just in the two visits I had at the office it seems as if we have known each other longer. She is very good dental hygienist. I trust that they know what is best for my dental needs

name: Tim Scott
text: Our family has been long term patients of Dr. Dillard and we can't say enough good things about the entire staff!  They're always up to date on new techniques and are very careful to make your visit as pain free as possible.  We wouldn't go anywhere else and we highly recommend Dr. Dillard!

name: Megan Scarborough
text:
Lisa Tucker is the most amazing person in the world! I could not imagine going to a dentist that did not employ someone like Lisa.

Also, everyone there is amazing too. They make you feel like you're at home which is hard to do at a dentist's office. I have recommended them multiple times and will continue to do so.

name: Kourtney Robinson
text: Great experience! More than patient and gentle with my sensitive teeth, always kind and trying to make sure i’m comfortable.

name: Brandi Newman
text:
From start to finish this dental office was top notch!  The front staff had smiles on their faces when you walk in.  Then your hygienist comes out to greet you, mine being Shelley.  She sits down in front of you making you feel like you were her family and I love that because it makes you feel as though they truly do care!  Then of course on to the next part of the dentist, WHICH I HATE” Shelley made very pleasant!
After all that the bad news😩!  I have MS so my teeth have a lot of issues and Dr. Dillard was so caring and very sweet and was going to work on a plan to help my teeth!  Great experience 💙😊😊😊

I am an actual patient here, not just some troll that gives bad reviews because I don’t like their political sign in the yard! 🙄 I guess I care more about having nice teeth than who Dr. Dillard votes for! And I do have nice teeth, because Shelly takes great care of me!

Dr. Dillard and his staff are very professional, kind, do excellent work, and will go over and beyond the call of duty to be there when you need them. I had a dental emergency when out of town, called them for advice, they gave me the name and number of a dentist out of town to help me temporarily, then, met me at their clinic as soon as I returned to Birmingham to repair my tooth permanently.
Another time when I had a dental emergency, Dr. Dillard was out of town. What did he do? He actually came back from his trip early to meet me at his clinic after hours on a day they were closed!  He brought his wife to be his dental assistant and he repaired my tooth in order for me not to miss work the next morning!  What else can I say about this awesome doctor and his amazing staff!?! They are the best! I highly recommend them!!!

He came home after his procedure and couldn’t stop talking of how great his experience was. From the time he walked in until he left everyone was welcoming and professional. name: Dr Russ Fine
text:
There's an old saying: "You get what you pay for."  It's true, especially when it comes to endodontic care. Let's be candid: endodontic care (root canals,etc) is very expensive ... no matter who you choose to provide it. So, why not make the most informed choice possible and pay for "the best?"  One must always bear in mind, especially when selecting health care professionals, that you are paying for "alot" of different things that come together during your procedure. They must have excellent training, extensive experience performing "your particular procedure," the latest equipment and technology, qualified and well-trained assistants; and, a discernable commitment to what it is they are doing. There's another thing: the patient pays, not only for what the provider does ... we pay for the provider's vast wealth of knowledge (acquired at considerable expense) AND FOR WHAT THE PROVIDER KNOWS WHAT NOT TO DO. Very important.

Both my wife and I have been cared for by Dr. Smith. Our initial referral was from a UAB School of Dentistry facaulty member, whom I have known for many years and for whom I have great respect. She told me "Dr. Smith is the best in Birmingham." Based on my experience (as well as that of my wife's) Dr. Smith may very well be the best endodontist in the country, seriously.  Let me put it this way: I love living in Birmingham, but at this stage of my life, I would prefer living in Fairhope. If I ever move to Fairhope and find myself in need of endodontic care ... I'm driving back to Birmingham, even if I'm in pain. He's that good.

name: Dave Verhine
text: I called Monday to schedule an appointment with Dr. Smith in order to assess a third molar, #30, that had previous received root canal therapy and seemed to be giving me some pain. The team worked me in quickly and I was seen 2 days later. The office is well kept, modern, and very clean. The operatory spaces are outfitted with the most cutting edge technologies such as GentleWave techanology by Sonendo, etc. I explained my dental history and Dr. Smith and his team quickly, and accurately, assessed my situation. Within 5 minutes Dr. Smith had pinpointed the problem--it was not #30, but #31, an adjacent tooth which had the beginnings of a small cavity due to the wearing away of previously applied sealants (different dentist, many years prior). I knew I was being treated by a true professional when he DID NOT recommend root canal therapy for that tooth, even though he could have, but instead recommended a simple filling. These are the kinds of things that set professionals apart from those trying to move patients through chairs. True patient care in all respects. His team provided me with all the information and history needed to allow my general dentist to pick up right where he left off. I will 100% recommend Advanced Endodontics to any and all my friends and family in the Birmingham area. Thanks again!

text: My experience with Cumberland Dental was awful, I had to go back several times for work that was done to be  done over again, like my filling came out within 2 or 3 day after being put in then when I went back he stuck a needle n my gum where I had no teeth at now that spot is hurting so bad I don't know what to do and the filling has came out again

text: I went to this dentist and they told me I had 100 cavities. Of Course I went to get a second opinion because I thought 100 cavities was absurd. Once I received a second opinion from a different dentist office,  I was then told I didn't have any.

name: Pierre Tubbs
text: False Advertising THE RECEPTIONIST TURNED ME AROUND AT THE DOOR..they DO NOT ACCEPT WALK-Ins

name: Michael Lindsey
text: They are expensive, unorganized, unprofessional and SLOW!

name: Michelle Riley
text: Wow!  If you have a choice of where to go...this is THE PLACE.  Immaculately clean, friendly staff. Dr. Alley examined me.  I really appreciated how he explained things to me.  He earned my trust immediately. I didn't feel rushed or pressured to make a decision about next steps. In fact, they made it a point to include me in the decision making.  You'll be very happy here.

name: Kevin Echols
text: Excellent Endodontist!!!!  I have had several root canals over the years and this was by far the best experience ever!  Dr. McCrary took the time discuss with me and then completed my root canal painlessly!  I had no pain or soreness after the numbness wore off!  His staff was very kind and helpful.  Excellent experience I would give them 10 stars if possible!!

name: Lindsay Wheeler
text: I was referred here from an emergency dentist, had an emergency root canal here, and these folks are amazing! They were very professional and were able to see me quicker than I thought. Most places have like a two week wait time, they were able to see me within days of scheduling me! And though my insurance apparently doesn't cover basically any root canal, they still did their best to make the process painless and easy. I definately recommend this place to anyone with issues that their regular dentist cannot handle!
